channel.title: .::Linksys::
channel.description:
Ok, I have a Linksys router.
I have setted my Port Forward on my Router.
Application - Start - End - Protocol - IP Address - Enable VinceScape - 43594 - 43594 - Both - <My Router IP> - Check
and I saved it.
Then I went to System Properties -> Advanced -> Enviorment Variables Then added "PATH" And for the Variable I had "C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\" Then added "CLASSPATH" And for the Variable I had "C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\"
Then I've downloaded DUC and Himachi, I now have a No-IP Host "vincescape.no-ip.com"
Now What do I do? Thanks
[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow]

item.title: .::Linksys::
item.dc:creator: @Vince Vince`
item.description:
@Vince wrote:

ok thanks, let me see if it works.

I just log in through MoparScape windows with the IP: vincescape.no-ip.info Right?

What’s the use of Hamachi

edit -
Hmm, Doesn’t work, I went to moparscape -> New IP: Vincescape.no-ip.info -> New Port -> 43594

Then this come out

Read full topic

item.title: .::Linksys::
item.dc:creator: @money67 money67
item.description:
@money67 wrote:

VinceScape - 43594 - 43594 - Both - <My Router IP> - Check[/code]that should be this [code]VinceScape - 43594 - 43594 - TCP - <My Router IP> - Check

and you should start your server and put it on the server status list.

Read full topic

item.title: .::Linksys::
item.dc:creator: @Vince Vince`
item.description:
@Vince wrote:

Ok, I have a Linksys router.

I have setted my Port Forward on my Router.

Application - Start - End - Protocol - IP Address - Enable
VinceScape - 43594 - 43594 - Both - - Check

and I saved it.

Then I went to System Properties -> Advanced -> Enviorment Variables
Then added “PATH” And for the Variable I had "C:Windows\System32;“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin”
Then added “CLASSPATH” And for the Variable I had “C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin”

Then I’ve downloaded DUC and Himachi, I now have a No-IP Host “vincescape.no-ip.com”

Now What do I do? Thanks

[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow]

Read full topic
